data.name: Clan Wars
data.detailed_description:
Discord


About the Game

partner games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1133060/Anarchy_Wolfs_law


Join to players around the world in one of the most modern games on Steam!
The game focuses equally on several PvPvE game modes, such as special operations, which will require informed planning and teamwork if you want to be successful.

Open world.

Survive the harsh conditions in online multiplayer or challenge yourself in a dangerous open world in single player mode. Collect weapons, tools and resources to help you survive, counting every sip of water and every match.

Explore secret, underground laboratories, life forms of unknown origin, mysterious searches for artifacts that challenge our knowledge of the laws of nature - all this is a huge world of one of several game modes.

Play alone or in teams of up to 4 people with a maximum of 64 players on open world maps and in limited locations.

Fight cruel creatures and deadly monsters - and other Survivors who are competing for the same prize.

Be the first to find the target, take it out and claim your reward.

Get to the evacuation point without being killed by those trying to steal the bounty.

Unique Combination Weapons - from modern submachine guns, militaristic assault rifles, brutal large-caliber weapons, classic historical weapons - a unique combination of killing tools that will satisfy any player.

Availability of cars and trucks will help players quickly move across open locations and have an advantage over the enemy.

The fierce and bloody battles in Clan Wars combine dynamic skirmishes, brutal forces, and a deep Survival system, creating a true hybrid of genres.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1610430/Clan_Wars/

data.short_description: Clan Wars is a severe first-person shooter with survival elements in the open world and in some limited locations, primarily oriented on online multiplayer game, and with the presence of a cars and trucks.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese, Korean, Czech
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
